0000000100010100 1101000000101000 1 -> sum: 1101000100111101, cout: 0
1110011111011111 0100000010000000 1 -> sum: 0010100001100000, cout: 1

1011101101001101 0011000111001111 0 -> sum: 1110110100011100, cout: 0
0000000000000000 0000000000000000 0 -> sum: 0000000000000000, cout: 0
1111111111111111 1111111111111111 1 -> sum: 1111111111111111, cout: 1
